skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Places a [Shield] buff for 2 turns, equal to 10% of this Champion's MAX HP, on the ally with the lowest HP (except this Champion).
skills.name: Fires of Old
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 6 Damage +5%
Lvl. 8 Damage +5%

skills.desc:
Increases the duration of all ally buffs by 1 turn, then decreases the duration of all ally debuffs by 1 turn.

Also heals all allies by 2.5% of their MAX HP. Heals by a further 2.5% MAX HP for each turn added to or removed from the duration of buffs and debuffs by this skill.
skills.name: Light of the Deep
skills.books:
Lvl. 2  Heal +5%
Lvl. 3  Heal +5%
Lvl. 4  Heal +5%
Lvl. 5  Heal +5%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +100%

skills.desc: Places a [Block Damage] buff on all allies for 1 turn, and a 15% [Continuous Heal] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
skills.name: Channel the Bloodline
